@ceesar56 Appreciate the perspective, but respectfully disagree, censorship against declared bad actors can just as easily been used against you and your allies

Centralized exchanges have no choice to comply, but censorship at the baselayer is unworkable and capturable, an attack vector

@ceesar56 @wakeupplinius This is about financial censorship against a largely anti-war civilian population

@ceesar56 How so?

@wakeupplinius Forms of censorship that can be used against your enemies can just as equally be used against you

Credible neutrality is creating about creating a fair playing field and protecting the rights of the individual

@maxwellstrachan So many misinformed replies here, crypto is credibly neutral and censorship-resistant by design, a tool that empowers everyone, including those you don‚Äôt personally like

Don‚Äôt forget that that tools of censorship can be used upon anyone, including yourself

Crypto is going to be used by your allies and by your enemies 

That is called credible neutrality, a tool of freedom available to all

Points of censorship are points of control 

Make peace with this, or this will be a confusing and tiring decade for you
